name: Swachh Bharat Abhiyan (shiv12a10)
description:
In India every drop of water is known as Ganga for every Indian, and water of rivers must be cleaned so I with my team presenting you a game which motivates players to think about cleaning a river, Just by playing this game you can think and understand the moto of Swachh Bharat Abhiyan mission of cleaning river. 

Play Now:- https://shiv12a10.github.io/Game-Jam/
